alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 4:57PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama, north central Decatur, Miller, Baker, Calhoun, central Early and northern Seminole Counties in southwestern Georgia through 630 PM EDT/530 PM CDT/... At 556 PM EDT/456 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Morgan to 7 miles north of Colquitt to 7 miles north of Donalsonville to 6 miles southeast of Ashford. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Morgan, Donalsonville, Edison, Arlington, Leary, Douglasville, Centerville, Gordon, Iron City, Damascus, Brinson, Jakin, Iveys Mill, Crosby, Parksville, Donaldsonville A/P, Bellview, Rowena and Howards Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
